attributes.action: keep cross farm school open, and stop closing small primary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the government to stop the closure of schools which have a fall in numbers,children thrive in smaller schools, the government keep closing schools and cramming children together, this will fail the pupils, and their education will suffer. We were promised that outside companies could move into the empty part of our school to provide revenue,(broken promise)all the other schools in the area are full, so will now end up overcrowded if our school closes, we find out end of Feb. Please help our cause,for the children.......
